title: Explosive Evidence Surfaces About The 2020 Election (Ep 1764)
description:
Order is being torn apart as the left openly calls for violence, and as they attack free and fair elections. I address the growing problem. 
In this episode, I also address the stunning revelations in the election 2020 film “2000 Mules.” 

News Picks:


2000 Mules has the left in a panic.

The leftist violence over the leaked Supreme Court draft has begun.


The woke Disney debacle is a lesson for liberal CEOs.


Sexual indoctrination for kids in New Jersey? 


Here’s a breakdown on the ongoing baby formula crisis. 


The minister of truth busted promoting disinformation, again!
